#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,T = 1;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll N,M,i,j,money_[55] = {0},amt_ = 0;
		char money[10],amt[10];
		printf("Case %d:\n",T);
		T++;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&N,&M);
		for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			scanf("%s",money);
			if(strstr(money,".") == NULL)
			{
				for(j=0;money[j] != '\0';j++)
				{
					money_[i] = (money_[i]*10) + (money[j]-'0');
				}
				money_[i] = money_[i] * 100;
			}
			else
			{
				ll count = 2, flag = 0;
				for(j=0;money[j] != '\0';j++)
				{
					if(money[j] != '.')
					{
						money_[i] = (money_[i]*10) + (money[j]-'0');
						if(flag)
							count --;
					}
					else flag = 1;
				}
				ll p = (ll)pow(10,count);
				money_[i] = money_[i] * p;
			}
		}
		sort(money_,money_+N);
		ll TT = 1;
		while(M--)
		{
			ll ans[55] = {0};
			scanf("%s",amt);
			printf("Scenario %lld:\n",TT);
			TT++;
			ll count = 2, flag = 0;
			for(j=0;amt[j] != '\0';j++)
			{
				if(amt[j] != '.')
				{
					amt_ = (amt_*10) + (amt[j]-'0');
					if(flag)
						count --;
				}
				else flag = 1;
			}
			ll p = (ll)pow(10,count);
			amt_ = amt_ * p;
			for(i=N-1; i >= 0; i--)
			{
				if(amt_ >= money_[i])
				{
					ans[i] = (amt_/money_[i]);
					amt_ = amt_ % money_[i];
				}
				if(ans[i])
				{
					if(money_[i] < 100)
						printf("%.2f %lld\n",money_[i]/100.0,ans[i]);
					else printf("%lld %lld\n",money_[i]/100,ans[i]);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
